name: Town Jumping Modern Car
description:
Town Jumping Modern Car is a simple stunt car racing game. Jump from rooftop to rooftop as you bounce your car around this mysterious terrain of a fantasy city where highways are a thing of the past. There are massive jumps, mid-air ramps, outlandish tracks and crazy stunts.
Features
- Amazing hanging sky bridges to cross.
- Multiple terrains to enjoy the unique car racing game.
- Stunning high quality 3D visuals and detailed textures.
- Time deadline to reach the finish point.
- Endless running game tracks.
